subject: [Radiance-general] objline doesn't seem to work properly and X11window flash and gone very quickly
body:
Message-ID: <8EF421DC-E12D-4AF0-B1F4-C24AC56D1346@dmu.ac.uk>

Ji,

Objline might bomb out if there are non-planar vertices in your model.

-John
